sourcesContent:
<template>
  <base-card>

</base-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ['name', 'description', 'website', 'phone', 'address', 'email'],
  emits: ['update-bootcamp'],
  data() {
    return {
      contactsAreVisible: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    toggleContacts() {
      this.contactsAreVisible = !this.contactsAreVisible;
    },
    updateBootcamp() {
      this.$emit('update-bootcamp', this.email);
    },
  },
};
</script>
